person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Two Manchester United soccer fans were wounded by unidentified gunmen on Friday and taken to hospital in the Austrian capital , police said .

Let's think step by step.

1. Manchester United: Although it is a team and not an individual person, sometimes teams or groups are referred to as singular entities. So, I will include it in the list.
2. unidentified gunmen: Even though they are not specifically identified, they are still considered people.

So, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

* Manchester United (team)
* unidentified gunmen (people)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Manchester United: This is not a person, so I will remove it from the list.
2. unidentified gunmen: These are definitely people, so I will keep them in the list.

So, the "Person" entities in the paragraph are:

* unidentified gunmen (people)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

location.content:

Paragraph: Two Manchester United soccer fans were wounded by unidentified gunmen on Friday and taken to hospital in the Austrian capital , police said .

1. Manchester: This is a city in the county of Greater Manchester, England.
2. Austrian capital: The Austrian capital is Vienna.

So, the "Location" entities in the paragraph are Manchester and Vienna (the Austrian capital).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. Manchester
2. Austrian capital (Vienna)

These are the relevant location entities in the paragraph.

organization.content:

Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
